participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous, I love sharing stories and experiences from my travels.
participant_1.background: I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned to love ice cream. I've been to many countries and love sharing my travel pictures and stories. We drink beer and eat food. My favorite fruit is watermelon because it is sweet and refreshing. I am looking for a home that is close to my parents so that I can easily help them out as they get older.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Passionate and determined, I enjoy dancing and have a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I have a place to practice my dancing and a laundry basket. I like meat. I'm secretly worried that my grocery store won't be successful. I have curly, red hair. He later became a bartender.

content.text: Hey! I'm from a small town in the Midwest, too!
Oh, that's cool. I grew up in Minnesota. I love ice cream, too. What's your favorite flavor?
My favorite is mint chocolate chip.
Mine too! Have you ever been to Italy? I went there for a study abroad program in college and I fell in love with the food.
No, I've never been to Europe. I've always wanted to go though!
You should definitely go! It's amazing.
I'm sure it is. I've seen a lot of pictures of Italy and it looks beautiful.
It is. I'm actually planning on moving there after I graduate.
That's awesome! I hope you have a great time there.
